tool_description: Accurate optical character recognition (OCR) API for images support up to 112 languages
name: AccuOCR
title: AccuOCR

api_list.name: /image-ocr
api_list.description: Extract text from base64 encoded image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://accuocr.p.rapidapi.com/image-ocr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "accuocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://accuocr.p.rapidapi.com/image-ocr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "accuocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
